sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row justify="start">
      <v-col
        v-for="(board, index) in boardList"
        :key="index"
        cols="4" 
        md="6"
        lg="4"
        xl="3"
        class="px-2"
      >
        <v-card
          class="mx-auto mb-6 rounded-lg bg-basil text-basil"
          max-width="250"
          @mouseenter="hoverCard(index, true)"
          @mouseleave="hoverCard(index, false)"
          :style="{ transform: board.hover ? 'scale(1.05)' : 'scale(1)' }"
        >
          <v-img
            :src="board.imageUrl"
            aspect-ratio="1/1"
            style="object-fit: cover; border-radius: 16px 16px 0 0;"
          ></v-img>

          <v-card-title style="height: auto;">
            {{ board.title }}
          </v-card-title>

          <v-card-subtitle style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
            {{ board.subtitle }}
          </v-card-subtitle>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      boardList: [
        // board objects
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    hoverCard(index, isHovered) {
      this.boardList[index].hover = isHovered;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.rounded-lg {
  border-radius: 16px;
}
.bg-basil {
  background-color: #356859 !important;
}
.text-basil {
  color: #FFFBE6 !important;
}
.v-card:hover {
  transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}
</style>
